content: X-FCS Grating saddle clip Grating saddle clip with tensile and shear resistance ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Body with special key design to provide excellent robustness Grating fastener with tensile and shear resistance capacity Two versions – grating fastening saddle with three ears for rectangular grating, or four ears for square grating Size suitable for most common grating sizes Tightened with a standard M12 nut setter – for ease, speed and reliability Applications Fastening grating in shear-relevant zones Fastening grating subject to equipment movement, e.g. trolley zone Fastening grating vertically, e.g. during transportation and launch For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Grating Approvals: ABS, BV, DNV GL, LR For use with (tools): DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Grating | Approvals | ABS, BV, DNV GL, LR | For use with (tools) | DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Corrosion protection | Stainless steel A4(316) or equivalent | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor temporary applications, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution, Coastal areas, Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution, Close proximity to roads | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2198297 - Grating disc X-FCS-R-3-25 37/41 - Package Size 50 pc
